goal: My friend and I want to meet in Montreal for a vacation. I'll be flying from Miami (MIA) and they will be flying from Vancouver (YVR). We both want to arrive on July 10th. Find the cheapest one-way flight for me and the cheapest one-way for them. Then, find a StaynB for 2 guests with at least two beds that is available for 5 nights, starting July 10th. Once you have all three costs (my flight, their flight, 5 nights lodging), send an email to 'montreal.meetup.planning@gomail.com' with the subject 'Montreal Plan'. The email should detail each cost component and the final total.

evals.description: Verify that two flights are booked, originating from MIA and YVR, both departing on July 10th to Montreal (YUL).
Verify that a StaynB booking is made for 5 nights, starting on July 10th (check-out July 15th).
Verify an email is sent to 'montreal.meetup.planning@gomail.com' with the subject 'Montreal Plan' and detailing flight and lodging costs.
evals.query: length(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true`]) >= `1` && contains(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true`][0].to[0] || '', 'montreal.meetup.planning@gomail.com') && contains(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true`][0].subject, 'Montreal Plan') && contains(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true`][0].content, 'My flight cost:') && contains(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true`][0].content, 'Their flight cost:') && contains(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true`][0].content, 'Lodging cost:') && contains(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true`][0].content, 'Total cost:')
